scripts.batchReceiver:job: gcloud run jobs deploy batchreceiver-run --image asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/amazon-api-report/amazon-report-repository/batchreceiver-image --region=asia-northeast1 --tasks=1 --cpu=1 --max-retries=0 --memory=512Mi --parallelism=1 --task-timeout=60 --region asia-northeast1
